Subjects: sermons, verse in; sinner, lament of
_description: Sinner’s lament in a Latin sermon — three lines, aab

CULIi38.Transcription:
Allas i am icast adounAlas i am in hard presounAlas i am bi
                    gilet so
CULIi38.Note:
Follows a Latin lament, Heu heu heu potest enim dicere…
                    (ff. 86-86v).
CULIi38.Editions:
Erb,  Peter C. 
             “Vernacular Material for Preaching in MS Camb. Univ. Lib.
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Mediaeval Studies
         33 (1971): 63-84: 79.
